description: To make llama or alpaca kaomojis you can really just add ༼ ( and ) ༽ to the sides of animal-like emoticons. Their faces look super wide, but this adds to their cuteness. Play around with whatever facial expression you want, but remember to give it a cute nose like all the other animals. Characters like ㅅ and ω work really well.  ༼ (`・ㅅ ・´) ༽ ༼ (´・ω・`) ༽ ༼ (´・ｪ・`) ༽ ༼ (´◓ɷ◓`) ༽ (◕(‘ 人 ‘) ◕) ༼ (。-`ω´-) ༽ ༼ ( •̀ ω•́ ) ༽ ༼ (* >ω<) ༽ ༼ (•̀௰•́ ) ༽ ༼ ( ˘•ω•˘ ) ༽ ༼ ( ˘•ㅅ•˘ ) ༽ ༼ (* >ㅅ<) ༽ ༼ (›´ω`‹ ) ༽ ༼ (ό௰ὸ) ༽ ༼ (›´ㅅ`‹ ) ༽
title: Llamas or Alpacas
